member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior

The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.DiskSpaceExhaustedOption.DiscardMessages" />.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyServices.FileSystemProxy.GetTempFileName

summary.vsli:raw: Creates a uniquely named zero-byte temporary file on disk and returns the full path of that file.

member.exception: 또는 가 이거나 빈 문자열인 경우

exception.vsli:raw: The directory does not exist.

exception.vsli:raw: The source is a root directory or The source path and the target path are the same.

exception.vsli:raw: The path exceeds the system-defined maximum length.

member.exception: 경로가 시스템 정의 최대 길이를 초과하는 경우

exception.vsli:raw: The operation is cyclic.

member.exception: 작업이 순환적인 경우

exception.vsli:raw: A file or directory name in the path contains a colon (:) or is in an invalid format.

exception.vsli:raw: The user lacks necessary permissions to view the path.

member.exception: 경로를 보는 데 필요한 권한이 사용자에게 없는 경우

exception.vsli:raw: The user does not have required permission.
